biotools.summary: Chemistry42 is a software platform for de novo small molecule design and optimization that integrates Artificial Intelligence (AI) techniques with computational and medicinal chemistry methodologies. Chemistry42 efficiently generates novel molecular structures with optimized properties validated in both in vitro and in vivo studies and is available through licensing or collaboration.
